name: sure
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 确定的，肯定的，毫无疑问的

example.eg: "What's wrong with him?" "I'm not really sure."
example.egtrans: “他怎么啦？”“我不太清楚。”

example.eg: I'm sure (that) I left my keys on the table.
example.egtrans: 我肯定我把钥匙放在桌上了。

example.eg: I feel absolutely sure (that) you've made the right decision.
example.egtrans: 我完全确信你的决定是正确的。

example.eg: It now seems sure (that) the election will result in another victory for the government.
example.egtrans: 现在看来，这次选举无疑又会以政府的胜利而告终。

example.eg: Shaun isn't sure whether/if he'll be able to come to the party or not.
example.egtrans: 肖恩不太确定他能否参加这次聚会。

example.eg: Is there anything you're not sure of/about?
example.egtrans: 还有不清楚的地方吗?

example.eg: We arrive early to be sure of getting a good seat.
example.egtrans: 我们早到一些，保证能找到好座位。

example.eg: There is only one sure way (= one way that can be trusted) of finding out the truth.
example.egtrans: 只有一种方法能够确保弄清真相。

trans_examp.trans_en: If you have a sure knowledge or understanding of something, you know or understand it very well.
trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常清楚的，十分了解的

example.eg: I don't think he has a very sure understanding of the situation.
example.egtrans: 我想他还不是十分了解情况。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 肯定的（地），确定的（地），无疑的（地）

example.eg: I know for sure that I won't be able to go to the party.
example.egtrans: 我非常肯定自己不能参加这个晚会。

example.eg: One thing's for sure - once the baby's born, your lives will never be the same again.
example.egtrans: 有一点是肯定的——一旦孩子出生，生活就完全不一样了。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be very or too confident

example.eg: She's become much more sure of herself since she got a job.
example.egtrans: 她找到工作以后自信多了。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: be confident that something is true

example.eg: He said that he wasn't completely sure of his facts.
example.egtrans: 他说他还不能完全肯定自己掌握的情况是否属实。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to have confidence in and trust someone

example.eg: Henry has only been working for us for a short while, and we're not really sure about him yet.
example.egtrans: 亨利才为我们工作了很短的一段时间，我们对他还不是很了解。

example.eg: You can always be sure of Kay.
example.egtrans: 你完全可以信任凯。

example.eg: She's sure to win.
example.egtrans: 她肯定会赢。

example.eg: I want to go somewhere where we're sure to have good weather.
example.egtrans: 我想去一个肯定有好天气的地方。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to look and/or take action to be certain that something happens, is true, etc.

example.eg: Make sure you lock the door when you go out.
example.egtrans: 出门的时候一定要锁好门。

name: sure
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: "Do you want to come swimming with us?" "Sure."
example.egtrans: “你想来跟我们一起游泳吗？”“当然。”

example.eg: "Will you help me with this?" "Sure I will."
example.egtrans: “能帮我拿一下这个吗？”“当然可以。”

example.eg: I sure am hungry.
example.egtrans: 我当然饿了。

example.eg: "I can't do it!" "Sure you can. I'll help you."
example.egtrans: “我干不了！”“你当然干得了。我会帮你。”

trans_examp.trans_en: said when someone has thanked you
trans_examp.trans_cn: （对别人表示感谢时的回应）没问题

example.eg: "Thanks for helping us out." "Sure, any time."
example.egtrans: “谢谢你帮我们。”“没问题，随时叫我。”
